body_html:
I built it from source, and it does not have this bug. However, I also don't have MKL installed locally, so the version I built from source doesn't link against libiomp5.so.

Can you try running this test case with a copy of Pytorch installed from conda? I assume that's how most people are getting Pytorch.

body:
I built it from source, and it does not have this bug. However, I also don't have MKL installed locally, so the version I built from source doesn't link against libiomp5.so.

Can you try running this test case with a copy of Pytorch installed from conda? I assume that's how most people are getting Pytorch.
